markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 10" pfs="Standard">
[Gate](/Spells.aspx?ID=1540)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 333 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You tear open a rift to another plane, creating a portal that creatures can travel through in either direction. This portal is vertical and circular, with a radius of 40 feet. The portal appears at a location of your choice on the destination plane, assuming you have a clear idea of both the destination's location on the plane and what the destination looks like. If you attempt to create a _gate_ into or out of the realm of a deity or another similarly powerful being, that being can prevent the gate from forming.
name: Gate

summary: Tear open a portal to another plane.
summary_markdown: Tear open a portal to another plane.
text: Gate Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 333 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Divine, Occult Spell Lists Elemental Range 120 feet Duration sustained up to 1 minute --- You tear open a rift to another plane, creating a portal that creatures can travel through in either direction. This portal is vertical and circular, with a radius of 40 feet. The portal appears at a location of your choice on the destination plane, assuming you have a clear idea of both the destination's location on the plane and what the destination looks like. If you attempt to create a gate into or out of the realm of a deity or another similarly powerful being, that being can prevent the gate from forming.
